description.en:
Collection of 23 stories about love in the everyday life of the Japanese.

16. Kyoko
17. That Afternoon
18. My Life: Second Example - Sawa
19. My Life: Third Example - She
20. Holiday Part 2
21. Sweet
22. Painful Love III
23. The First Time
